    Composite mutation strategy.

    • Constructor Detail

      • CompositeMutationStrategy

        public CompositeMutationStrategy(org.apache.commons.math3.random.RandomGenerator random,
                         SubstitutionMutationStrategy substitution,
                         double substitutionRate,
                         IndelMutationStrategy indel,
                         double indelRate,
                         AmbiguousSubstitutionMutationStrategy ambiguous,
                         double ambiguousRate)
        Create a new composite mutation strategy with the specified parameters.
        Parameters:
        random - random, must not be null
        substitution - substitution mutation strategy, must not be null
        substitutionRate - substitution rate, substitutionRate, indelRate, and ambiguousRate must sum to 1.0d
        indel - indel mutation strategy, must not be null
        indelRate - indel rate, substitutionRate, indelRate, and ambiguousRate must sum to 1.0d
        ambiguous - ambiguous mutation strategy, must not be null
        ambiguousRate - ambiguous rate, substitutionRate, indelRate, and ambiguousRate must sum to 1.0d
